hypothesis_content.title: Stress-to-Neutral Recovery via V-Shaped Volume Reversal
hypothesis_content.statement: Following a STRESS regime (high volatility, sharp decline), a V-shaped recovery pattern where BTC rallies 8%+ in 48 hours on declining volume (second day volume < first day) and the Crypto Fear & Greed Index jumps 20+ points signals transition to NEUTRAL regime, offering long entry for mean reversion.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Sharp rallies on declining volume after stress events often indicate short covering rather than new bullish conviction. Combined with sentiment rebound but still cautious funding rates, this suggests exhaustion of panic selling and transition to consolidation/neutral phase rather than immediate bull resumption.
entry_conditions: Previous 5 days classified as STRESS regime
Day 2 volume < Day 1 volume (declining volume rally)
Crypto Fear & Greed Index increases ≥20 points during rally
BTC funding rates remain negative or neutral (<0.005%)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 8% profit or BTC reaches previous STRESS regime high

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Over 35% of such signals see price retrace below stress lows within 5 days (failed recovery) instead of establishing neutral consolidation.
